name: PHASEGeneratorNodeDefinition
desc: A base class for nodes that provide audio data to generate sound.

items.name: func setCalibrationMode(calibrationMode: PHASECalibrationMode, level: Double)
items.desc: Selects a loudness correction strategy and reference level.

items.name: var calibrationMode: PHASECalibrationMode
items.desc: A sound pressure level strategy for loudness correction.

items.name: var mixerDefinition: PHASEMixerDefinition
items.desc: An object that combines audio layers for the node's output.

items.name: var group: PHASEGroup?
items.desc: A group this node conforms to for gain and rate control.

items.name: var rate: Double
items.desc: A playback speed for the node's audio.

items.name: var rateMetaParameterDefinition: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition?
items.desc: A meta parameter that dynamically changes the audio's rate.

items.name: var gainMetaParameterDefinition: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition?
items.desc: A meta parameter that dynamically changes the audioâ€™s loudness.
